Bullet tried to think back to the fight. He could see Chameleon flick the a=
larm with his toung and he remembered backhanding the bot. Everything that =
happened after that was a red blurr to the bot.

"Chameleon ticked me off s=
ir." The bullbot made no excuses for his actions, he didn't admit or deny t=
hat it had happened. He just knew that if the bot sitting in front of him h=
ad accused him then it must be true. Bullet knew that he'd have to answer t=
he claims against him and he knew that he'd have to take whatever punishmen=
t that Perceptor would give him.


Perceptor::

"Now Bullet, I want to know=
 why did you attacked Chameleon?"
said Perceptor
